Job Title: Assistant Vice President, Life Sciences Investments

Location: San Francisco, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Finance, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Location:  San Francisco, CA or New York, NY

 Job Type:  Permanent, full-time

Company Overview

Incorporated in 1974, Temasek is a global investment company headquartered in Singapore and supported by 13 international offices. Temasek’s S$382 billion portfolio

As an institution, we have a stake in the well-being of our communities and recognize that environmental, social and governance factors can impact them as well as the long-term sustainability of companies. Additional information about Temasek can be found at

Job Description

Temasek is looking for an Assistant Vice President to join our growing US Life Sciences practice. This is an important role with significant opportunity for progression, and we are interested in individuals that combine a proven passion for the life sciences (scientific/clinical/industry backgrounds welcome) with a robust financial toolkit (e.g. financial modeling and valuation analysis).

The role will involve:

 Conducting fundamental research on life sciences trends to form differentiated views  Identifying and assessing investment opportunities across different company stages (venture, growth, mature), including private and public equity  Supporting science/tech, business, financial, legal, and other due diligence workstreams  Preparing financial models and decks, and recommending deals to the firm’s investment committee  Monitoring portfolio companies to identify value creation, investment, and divestment opportunities  Developing relationships with investment professionals, management teams, key opinion leaders, and other relevant institutions for origination of new deals 

Qualifications & Experience

The ideal candidate(s) should have:

 Bachelor’s degree from a top tier academic institution; ideally in science, engineering, or finance  Advanced degree candidates are welcome (e.g. MD, PhD, MBA, MPH, BME)  4+ years of relevant business experience in the field of life sciences, including investment banking, equity research, strategy consulting, or business development roles  Demonstrated interest in finance and investing  Strong analytical capabilities and initiative to learn new skills quickly  Proven ability to manage priorities and work independently in a professional setting  Good communication, interpersonal & team skills  Flexibility to work in a cross-border, multi-cultural, team-based environment 

Other Requirements

All candidates must be authorized to work in the United States (visa sponsorship not available)

Salary Range: Base salary of US$175K – US$245K per annum (compensation structure includes various additional incentives payable in April, August and October annually)

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
